product-descriptor.name: DBeaver
product-descriptor.description: Free Universal Database Manager and SQL Client. Java-based application, supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, DB2, MSSQL, Sybase, Derby, Cassandra and any database which has JDBC driver.
